name: Koala & Friends Dress Up
description:
100% of the donations for this game will be going to WIRES to support their wildlife emergency relief fund. It's free to play in-browser, but if you'd like to support you can download and donate.

Dress up a Koala, Wombat, or Brush Tailed Possum in a chill curated fashion adventure.

Controls:

Click and Drag clothing items to your animal of choice.

Spacebar to reset the wardrobe.

Click the Landscape Icon for a new background.

Click the Koala Icon for a new animal.

Click Done when you're Done and snap a picture of your perfect creation. Please post your finished marsupial in the comments, we'd love to see them!

GAME BY

Colton David | Programming

Shutteye | Art

Jon Ke | Music
